title: BestsellerBound Anthology
description: A collection of tales by a variety of authors.Wish Upon A Star by Lainey BancroftTears For Hesh by J. Michael RadcliffeYou Can Call Me Ari by Darcia HelleFlames by Maria SavvaMinor Details by Jaleta CleggIce Cream Man by Neil SchillerNo Eyes But Mine Shall See by Sharon E. author: Darcia Helle
